A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: this was a disgrace to the Star Wars title. There was no redeeming moments. there was kidsy jokes through out the entire movie. The Plot was terrible\, it lacked any interesting qualities. The acting was terrible. The new characters were very unlikeable. Without spoiling the Trainwreck of a movie\, I'll just say don't get your hopes up\, Carrie Fisher's last movie deserves to be better than this. I wouldn't be surprised if she died because she saw what this movie would become.
